name: Sarah Johnson
notes: Chronic lower back pain from desk job. Prefers deep tissue work on lumbar region. Heat therapy helps. Avoid prone position due to breathing issues.

name: Michael Chen
notes: Marathon runner. Focus on IT band, quads, and calves. Has had previous hamstring strain (left). Likes firm pressure.

name: Emily Rodriguez
notes: Pregnant - currently 28 weeks. Side-lying position only. Focus on lower back and hip pain. No deep work on legs. Certified prenatal massage.

name: David Thompson
notes: Allergic to lavender, eucalyptus, and tree nut oils. Use unscented only. Fibromyalgia - light to medium pressure. Avoid trigger points.

name: Jennifer Williams
notes: Chronic shoulder tension and headaches. Previous rotator cuff surgery (2019, right). TMJ issues - include jaw and neck work. Weekly appointments preferred.

name: Robert Garcia
notes: Construction worker. Heavy focus on hands, forearms, and shoulders. Callused hands - extra time on finger extensors. Lower back issues from lifting.

name: Amanda Foster
notes: Anxiety and stress-related tension. Very sensitive to touch - start light. Prefers relaxation massage with calming music. No sudden movements.

name: James Mitchell
notes: Post-surgery recovery - lumbar fusion L4-L5 (6 months ago). Cleared for massage by surgeon. Avoid direct pressure on surgical site. Focus on surrounding muscles.

name: Lisa Anderson
notes: Stress-related tension. Teacher - lots of standing. Focus on feet, calves, and upper back. Likes hot stones when available. Evening appointments only.

name: Christopher Lee
notes: Tennis player. Chronic tennis elbow (lateral epicondylitis) right arm. Wrist and forearm work essential. Ice after session recommended.

name: Patricia Brown
notes: Breast cancer survivor - lymphedema risk right arm. No deep pressure on right arm or right side of torso. Certified oncology massage required.

name: Thomas Wilson
notes: Sciatica - pain radiates down left leg. Piriformis syndrome suspected. Glute and hip work helps. Stretching recommendations appreciated.

name: Maria Santos
notes: Rheumatoid arthritis - hands and feet. Very gentle pressure on joints. Flare-ups vary - check in before each session. Heat helps.

name: Kevin O'Brien
notes: Software developer. Severe neck and upper back tension. Carpal tunnel symptoms both wrists. Ergonomic advice requested. Twice monthly.

name: Susan Taylor
notes: Chronic migraine sufferer. Neck and shoulder tension triggers headaches. Dim lighting required. No strong scents. Cancel if migraine active.

name: Daniel Martinez
notes: Auto accident 2023 - whiplash recovery. Still has neck stiffness. Cleared by doctor for massage. Gentle cervical work. Document progress.

name: Nancy Clark
notes: Elderly client (72). Osteoporosis - no deep pressure. Thin skin - bruises easily. Arthritis in hands and knees. Prefers warm room.

name: Ryan Hughes
notes: CrossFit athlete. Focus on mobility and recovery. Tight hip flexors and thoracic spine. Okay with deep pressure. Morning appointments.

name: Jessica Adams
notes: Postpartum - 4 months. Nursing mother. Upper back pain from feeding. Diastasis recti - no abdominal work. Short sessions (45 min) preferred.

name: William Turner
notes: Parkinson's disease - early stage. Some tremor in hands. Massage helps with rigidity. Caregiver accompanies. Extra time for positioning.
